content: pink ribbon pin crochet pattern by nadine borovicka http //nadinescrafts blogspot com http //nadinespatterns blogspot com/ make in any color you like for any type of awareness you also have permission to make these and sell them for charity or to make them and hand them out make copies of this pattern to go with them encourage others to make them as well this is an awareness ribbon so i do not want to limit the use of this pattern in anyway materials worsted weight yarn in any color- you can do this for any awareness ribbon size g crochet hook scissors little bit of glue small safety pins make a slipknot chain 15 stitches insert crochet hook through the fifth chain from the beginning of the chain front view back view yarn over and pull hook through yarn over again pull through to make 16th chain stitch chain 4 more stitches and fasten_off attach to whatever you want with safety pin this pattern chart and photos are property of nadine borovicka all rights reserved please feel free to make these and sell them especially if they are going to raise money for awareness © copyright 2007 by nadine borovicka
